errors.title: Missing API Key
errors.description: The request failed because the `x-api-key` header was not provided. Please ensure you are including your unique API key in the request headers.
errors.resolution: Add `x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY` to your request headers.

errors.title: Invalid API Key
errors.description: The API key provided does not match any active client in our database.
errors.resolution: Check your API key for typos or generate a new one from the dashboard.

errors.title: Unpaid Bills
errors.message: Service suspended due to unpaid bills.
errors.description: Access to this service has been temporarily suspended because the associated account has outstanding unpaid bills.
errors.resolution: Please contact support or settle your invoices to restore access.

errors.title: Maintenance Mode
errors.description: The system is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance.
errors.resolution: Please try again later. Check our status page for updates.

errors.title: Rate Limit Exceeded
errors.description: You have exceeded the allowed number of requests per minute.
errors.resolution: Reduce the frequency of your requests.
